extension.description: Rinse has dominated London’s radio airwaves for over a decade as a hub of the capital’s thriving urban music community. From Dubstep to Grime to House and everything in between, Rinse has championed London’s diverse cultural needs, reaching massively under-represented communities with grass roots music.
